short_summary: Apple Mac Pros and Apple 16-inch MacBook Pros with Warranty or equivalent for Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada- Amendment 000
description: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada has a requirement for 5 x Apple Mac Pro with M2 Ultra and warranty or equivalent and 5 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Max chip and warranty or equivalent as per the List of Deliverables in the request for Quotation.
